item.title: Auto-Casting Barrage?
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Alright guys, I want to make it so that when I’m holding an ancient staff, that I can Auto-Cast Ice Barrage. I’m not sure on how to do this, so I was hoping someone could help me with the process of it.

Here is my current code:

if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1 && !pl2.protectMage()) { if (mageTimer <= 0) { AttackMage(playerIndexx); mageTimer = 10; } } else { sendMessage( "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked"); }

I want to make an Auto-Caster. What would I have to add to this code, in order to make it so that I can auto- cast with an ancient staff?

Thanks in advance guys.

Read full topic
